get.summary: Retrieves the public chat history for various channels.

parameters.name: generalDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the General channel from the result.

parameters.name: tradeDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the Trade channel from the result.

parameters.name: helpDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the Help channel from the result.

parameters.name: clanHubDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the ClanHub channel from the result.

parameters.name: combatLFGDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the CombatLFG channel from the result.

parameters.name: raidLFGDisabled
parameters.description: If true, excludes the RaidLFG channel from the result.

get.summary: Retrieves the logs for a specific clan.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the clan.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of logs to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of logs to retrieve.

400.description: If the requested limit exceeds the maximum allowed limit.

404.description: If no logs are found for the specified clan.

get.summary: Retrieves the logs for a specific player within a clan.

parameters.name: clanName
parameters.description: The name of the clan.

parameters.name: playerName
parameters.description: The name of the player.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of logs to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of logs to retrieve.

200.description: Returns the requested player logs within the clan.

400.description: If the requested limit exceeds the maximum allowed limit.

404.description: If no logs are found for the specified player within the clan.

get.summary: Retrieves the recruitment information for a specific clan.

parameters.name: clanName
parameters.description: The name of the clan.

200.description: Returns the recruitment information for the clan.

404.description: If the specified clan is not found.

get.summary: Retrieves the most active guilds based on the provided query parameters.

parameters.name: clanQueryInfoJson
parameters.description: JSON string containing query parameters.

200.description: Returns the list of most active guilds.

400.description: If the provided JSON is invalid.

get.summary: Retrieves a clan's standings for all objectives in the Clan Cup.

parameters.name: clanName
parameters.description: The name of the clan.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode for which to retrieve standings.

parameters.name: previousCup
parameters.description: Optionally set to true to get standings for the previous cup

200.description: Returns the clan's standings for all objectives.

400.description: If the provided date format is invalid.

404.description: If no standings are found for the specified clan, game mode, and date.

get.summary: Retrieves a clan's score and current standing in a given ClanCupObjectiveType.

parameters.name: clanName
parameters.description: The name of the clan.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode for which to retrieve the standing.

parameters.name: objectiveType
parameters.description: The type of ClanCupObjective.

parameters.name: previousCup
parameters.description: Optionally set to true to get standings for the previous cup

400.description: If the provided date format is invalid.

404.description: If the clan or objective is not found.

get.summary: Retrieves the current top 10 clans in every ClanCupObjectiveType for the currently active cup.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode for which to retrieve top clans.

200.description: Returns the list of top clans for each objective in the current cup.

get.summary: Retrieves the top 10 clans in every ClanCupObjectiveType for the previous cup.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode for which to retrieve top clans.

200.description: Returns the list of top clans for each objective in the previous cup.

get.summary: Retrieves the top 10 clans in every ClanCupObjectiveType for a cup with the given end date.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date of the clan cup.

200.description: Returns the list of top clans for each objective.

get.summary: Retrieves the overall leaderboard for a specific game mode, showing total points for each clan.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode to retrieve the leaderboard for (e.g., "Default", "Ironman").

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Optional. The year to filter results by.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Optional. The month to filter results by.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

get.summary: Retrieves the leaderboard for a specific category within a game mode.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode to retrieve the leaderboard for (e.g., "Default", "Ironman").

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category to retrieve the leaderboard for (e.g., "Woodcutting", "Cooking").

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Optional. The year to filter results by.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Optional. The month to filter results by.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Optional. The maximum number of results to return. Default is 10, maximum is 100.

get.summary: Retrieves the standing for a specific clan in a given game mode.

parameters.name: gameMode
parameters.description: The game mode to retrieve the clan standing for (e.g., "Default", "Ironman").

parameters.name: clanName
parameters.description: The name of the clan to retrieve the standing for.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Optional. The year to filter results by.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Optional. The month to filter results by.

get.summary: Retrieves the required and latest build versions from the configuration.

404.description: If the build version information is not found.

get.summary: Fetches the profile of an entity (player or clan) by their name.

parameters.name: leaderboardName
parameters.description: Name of the leaderboard (e.g "players:default" to look up a player in the default game mode and "players:ironman" to look up an ironman).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the entity.

404.description: If the entity profile is not found

get.summary: Gets a range of entities (players or clans) in the specified leaderboard field. No more than 100 entities can be queried at a time.

parameters.name: leaderboardName
parameters.description: Name of the leaderboard (e.g "players:default" to look up players in the default game mode and "players:ironman" to query ironman leaderboards).

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the stat (e.g. "total_level", "attack" or "reckoning_of_the_gods").

parameters.name: startCount
parameters.description: The starting position for the entities list.

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: The ending position for the  entities list.

get.summary: Retrieves the logs for a specific player from all clans.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the player.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of logs to skip.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of logs to retrieve.

200.description: Returns the requested player logs from all clans.

400.description: If the requested limit exceeds the maximum allowed limit.

404.description: If no logs are found for the specified player.

get.summary: Retrieves the profile for a specific player.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the player.

404.description: If the player profile is not found.

get.summary: Retrieves a simple profile for a specific player.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the player.

200.description: Returns the requested simple player profile.

404.description: If the player profile is not found.

get.summary: Gets the latest prices for a specific item, including the lowest price, highest price, and optionally the average price.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The ID of the item to get the latest prices for.

parameters.name: includeAveragePrice
parameters.description: If true, include the average price of the item from the past 24 hours.

get.summary: Retrieves detailed price information for a specific item.
get.description:
This endpoint provides comprehensive price details for a given item, including:
- The top 10 lowest prices with their corresponding volumes
- The top 10 highest prices with their corresponding volumes
- The average price of the item over the past 1 day, 7 days, and 30 days
- The trade volume of the item over the past 1 day
            
The prices and volumes are retrieved from the market offer collections and are based on the current state of the market.
The average prices and trade volume are calculated using historical trade records within the specified time ranges.
            
Use this endpoint to gain insights into the price distribution, average prices, and recent trade activity of an item.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The ID of the item to retrieve price details for.

200.description: Returns the detailed price information for the item.

400.description: If the itemId is invalid or missing.

get.summary: Gets the latest prices for all items, including the lowest price, highest price, and optionally the average price.

parameters.name: includeAveragePrice
parameters.description: If true, include the average price of each item from the past 24 hours.

get.summary: Retrieves the price history of a specific item over a given period.

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The ID of the item to get price history for.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period for which to retrieve the price history (supported: '1d', '7d', '30d', '1y').

get.summary: Retrieves the trades with the highest item prices within a specified period.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period for which to retrieve the most valuable trades (e.g., '1d', '7d', '30d', '1y').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve (between 1 and 10).

get.summary: Retrieves the top items by trade volume within a specified period.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The period for which to retrieve the top items by volume (e.g., '1d', '7d', '30d', '1y').

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve (between 1 and 10).

ApiKey.description: API Key needed to access protected endpoints
ApiKey.name: X-Api-Key
